If someone is working for a company and there is information leak to a competitor company and he/she has connections/links with this competitor company, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If someone has been observed to have conversations with another person from competitor company, then they are friends
If someone has been observed to have conversations with another person from competitor company, then he/she has links/connections to competitor company
If someone has unauthorized access to confidential information of his company, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If someone is a valuable or reliable employee, then he/she is not suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If there are allegations for someone being involved in corporate espionage, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If someone has been working previously in competitor company and there is information leak to a competitor company, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If someone possesses books about startups and technology, then he/she is planning to a startup
If someone is planning to a startup, then he/she is not suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If there are high value transactions to someone's bank account, then he/she is attempting to secure funds
If someone is attempting to secure funds, then he/she is planning to a startup
If anabolic steroids have been located in someone's stuff, then he/she is using anabolic steroids
If someone is interested in body building, then he/she is using anabolic steroids
If someone has been bullied in workplace, then he/she is using anabolic steroids
If someone has been bullied in workplace and there is there is information leak to a competitor company, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
If here are attempts by someone's colleagues to discredit him, then he/she is being bullied in workplace
If someone has had a high value purchase, then he/she has received a large amount of money
If someone has had a high value purchase, then his/her purchase is under a lease or loan
If someone has had a high value purchase, then he/she has shared the purchase with his/her partner
If someone has received a large amount of money and there is there is information leak to a competitor company, then he/she is suspect for being involved in corporate espionage
